questionText: In Java/C#, what keyword is used to stop the execution of a switch block?
Which operator is used to access the value at the address held by a pointer in C/C++?
Which concept allows a single function name to have multiple implementations in C++ or Java?
What is the size of a char variable in most modern C/C++ implementations (in bytes)?
Which file extension is typically used for header files in C and C++?
In C#, what access modifier restricts access to only the class itself and deriving classes?
What does main return by default in a standard C program?
In C++, which stream object is commonly used for outputting data to the console?
In C#, which type is used for storing single Unicode characters?
What is the final method called by the Garbage Collector before memory is reclaimed in Java?
